text: 24.27: Stt 3.15; Nam 21.9; Lo 18.15; Sng 22.1-21; Ais 7.14; 53.7; Dan 9.24; Mal 3.1; Zo 13.31; FG 3.13Ana nen mani ga suaŋgiap, mbaram Fhe Bakɨme buni vhuuin mani ga nzuai. Ana Fhe Bakɨmen buni vhuuiŋ mani ga nzuav, ana fhara Moses suaŋgi bunira kegap, mani ga nzuav, vhɨra mba Fhe Bakɨme kamthooŋ gumgi suaŋgi buni phorgav mani ga nzuai. Ana mani ga nzuav, mani khɨvav vov, mba Fhe Bakɨme buni vhuuiŋ nɨɨŋge, mba buni Fhe Bakɨme ara nzuai buni ma. Ana ntan mani ga nzuav mani khɨvi.
